text: Penguins of Madagascar is a 2014 American 3D computer-animated spy action comedy movie by DreamWorks Animation. It's based on the animated series of the same name, serving as a prequel to the show and as a spin-off of the Madagascar franchise. Tom McGrath reprises his role of Skipper from both the show and the movies while Chris Miller and Christopher Knights reprises their roles of Kovalski and Private from the movies with Conrad Vernon replacing John DiMaggio as Rico. John Malkovich and Benedict Cumberbatch join them voicing new characters. It was released by 20th Century Fox on November 26, 2014. It was re-released by Universal Studios. ==Video game== A video game titled Penguins of Madagascar, it has been to be released for Wii, Wii U, and Nintendo 3DS. title: Penguins of Madagascar
